title: Comparative Research-Based Pedagogical Development for Remote Design Studio Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design process comprehension and mathematical modeling understanding
context.additional_context: Analyzing effectiveness of remote design studio education in VR/simulation environments for current practitioners and exploring instructional improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the differences in interaction between physical and remote studios using quantitative and qualitative metrics

Learners can design a prototype with core peer feedback system functions (3 evaluation items, 1 feedback form) in a VR simulation environment (Unity/Unreal Engine) within 1 week and submit a development outcome scoring â‰¥4/5 average on functionality/usability from 2 peer evaluators.
Learners can identify issues arising during the remote conversion of design critique (crits) sessions and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
